divs: Sighting DetailsI often stand out in the back yard in the predawn to spot satellites. This morning, I was looking high in the south and noticed 3 faint stars. Then I noticed that 1 of the stars was moving. I have seen many satellites and this was traveling far too slow, but if it was a plane it was traveling extremely high and fast. After watching it travel due south for a short time, it flashed with a brilliant white light and went dark. I continued watching for about 30 seconds and there was a second flash of light like the first, but it had moved off of the course it had been traveling on, a bit to the south-east. I tried watching more but I lost line of sight from the rooftop. About a month ago, I spotted the same thing. Probably something military, but I don't know.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
